            Email 1:
Hello Ms. Sylvia,                    I hope all is well on your side. I’m enquiring about 3,500MT of vanadium pentoxide from South Africa to Fos Sur Mer. I would like to discuss a late-July laycan, and short lead time of ten days. Please advise the port of loading in South Africa.                    Many thanks,                    Jaye
Email 2:
Ms. Sylvia,
The address is:               Address:
Mr. Jean-Christophe Constantinou
Hydrodec Plc
Bellevue House, 27th Avenue
Neston, Chester
CH64 3RH
England
Tel: +44 151 356 7972
Fax: +44 151 356 8393
website: http://www.hydrodec.com
e-mail: jconstantinou@hydrodec.com

<Cover Letter, Page 1 of 3>
Mr. Jean-Christophe Constantinou
Hydrodec Plc
Bellevue House
27th Avenue
Neston, Chester
CH64 3RH
England
Tel: +44 151 356 7972
Fax: +44 151 356 8393
www.hydrodec.com
E-mail: jcon
Email 3:
Ms. Sylvia
If you accept this offer, please let me know so I can send you our
shipment’s documents.

<Cover Letter, Page 2 of 3>
A. Verifying the Product
1. Using the Web
Find the product name: vanadium pentoxide
Using Google, find the definition:
http://www.thefreedictionary.com/vanadium+pentoxide
The definition is:
“Vanadium(V) oxide is the inorganic compound with the formula V2O5. It is used industrially as a catalyst for sulfuric acid production and as a catalyst in the exhaust systems of motor vehicles. It is a brown/yellow solid, although when freshly precipitated from aqueous solution, its colour is deep orange. The molecular and crystal structure of V2O5 has been intensively studied by many techniques. The structure of the bulk is well understood
Email 4:
Reply from Ms. Sylvia to Mr. Jean-Christophe Constantinou
Dear Mr. Jean-Christophe Constantinou,
Thank you for the inquiry about vanadium pentoxide. As requested by your customer we could offer you Fos Sur Mer for loading late-July. The port of loading is Secunda, South Africa. We can load 3,500MT in bulk, packed in 25kg bags. We will then be able to provide the following documents: the Proforma Invoice, the Commercial Invoice, the Bill of Lading, and the Packing List. The payment will be done by the term L/C at sight.
We are a successful chemical wholesaler, representing many companies, from producers, traders and brokers. We specialize in chemicals, pharmaceuticals, minerals, fertilizer, additives and intermediates, such as Vanadium Pentoxide. We also provide trade support, which includes:

            Email 1:
Hello Ms. Elliot,                    We’d like to load 9,000MT of crude palm oil from Port Klang to Chennai. Could you confirm your earliest availability and share a ballpark lumpsum freight?                    Kind regards,                    Raj
Email 2:
Hi Raj.                  We are available now if your buyer has vessels open. Could you advise which product you require?                    Kind regards,                    Mari

[<Email 3>:]
Hello Mari.                  We are looking for mixed bleached and deodorised palm olein (MDB). Kind regards,                  Raj

[<Email 4>:]
Hi Raj,                  It’s available at USD145 per MT CIF. The buyer is calling and seeking to load in August.                    Kind regards,                  Mari

Email 5:
Hello Mari.                  Our buyer will like to load CIF Chennai, so we will like to send an offer with FOB price. If your seller is open to send offer with FOB price, let me know.                  Best regards,                  Alastair
Email 3:
Sorry Raj, I have misunderstood your last message.                  For mixed bleached and deodorised palm olein I would like to confirm the percentage of free fatty acids (%FFA), the percentage of acid value (%AV), and if there is any mention of gum level.                    Kind regards,                  Mari

<Email 3>:
Mari,                  FFA max 0.1% and AV max 3.0%. No mention of gum level.                  Kind regards,                  Raj

[<Email 4>:]
Hi Mari,                  That is a different grade. Do you have 58 deg C or lower at max 0.1% FFA?                    Kind regards,                  Raj

[<Email 4>:]
Hello Raj,                  We don’t have in stock. Our stocks are limited. We will get back to you as soon as it becomes available.
Email 4:
I’ll share with my buyer. Kind regards,                    Raj

[<Email 4>:]
Hi Raj,                  I have an order in place but do you know what your shipment would be valued in USD?                    Kind regards,                  Alastair

<Email 4>:
It will be based on ISO 22000 and RSPO certified grade.                  Kind regards,                  Raj

[<Email 4>:]
We haven’t sold our 58 deg C or lower grade. I can do RBD stearin and that would probably be better for the buyer.                    Kind regards,                  Alastair

<Email 4>:
Hi Alastair,                  Sorry for late reply. I missed your message. What does RBD stearin mean? Does it mean Special RBD?                  Best regards,                  Raj

<Email 4>:
It’s

Dear Ms. Smith,                    Our office is arranging a 2,400MT freight of fresh fruit from South Africa to Antwerp, departing next week. Please confirm your earliest dates, and if you have a standard demurrage rate.                    Thanks,                    John
Email 2:
Dear John,                           As you are probably aware, we regularly ship fresh produce out of South Africa to Antwerp. The two ships currently loading are scheduled for departure next week. Should the vessel of your choice not be available, we will be delighted to offer another ship. We attach a charter summary for your information, and confirm our standard rates in accordance with your enquiry.                    We look forward to hearing from you in due course.                           Yours sincerely,
Juan Du Preez
Umschlagskontor          November 2005
John,           Mit freundlichen Grüssen,          Juanna
P.S. We appreciate that your position may be difficult as your vessel will have to load quickly. Our office has a well-equipped lab for testing and we can mobilise one of our freight inspectors to check the condition of the cargo. He can carry out quality checks with our certified biological agency in
Email 3:
Dear John,
We confirm receipt of your enquiry regarding a new vessel for your cargo loading on 1st December. As you know, we are currently full. However, as the voyage is only 21 days, we are confident that our southbound vessel will return home quickly and be available for an early charter. If you wish to discuss the matter further, please contact Mr. Du Preez or myself.
Yours sincerely,
Nicol Kohn
Schiffahrtkontor                    December 2005
Note to examiner:  Please note that in real life, the Master would have called the brokers to check the schedule and check rates for other vessels on standby. The case would be different if he was under the threat of a late delivery.
IN LOADING:
Master's routine telephone call to brokers for charter, along with ShipMan® default rates
Option to select different ship.
Email 4:
Dear John,            We regret that the vessel "Daanen de Jong" was detained by the USCG in New York. In view of the heavy congestion at Antwerp, we advise you to offer an earlier departure to the market. Unfortunately, our southbound vessel "Baedeker" has been chartered by our German branch for a new deep sea voyage and is now on its way to the USA.                  The vessel "Winkelhuis" has just been loaded and will depart on 5th December. Our dispatch department is aware of the urgency of the matter and is currently checking availability for a temporary substitute. We attach a chart for your information and please let me know when we can expect your intentions.                    Regards,
Nicol Kohn
